metadata.title: Traveling Waves in Spatial SIRS Models

body_text.text: It follows from Lemma 2.1 that Theorem 1.1 is equivalent to the following theorem.

body_text.text: It is trivial to see that the assertion of Theorem 2.2 (ii) follows directly from Lemmas 3.1 and 3.2.
